name: TRAPP3D - Demo
description:
A group of friends decided to come together to learn Unreal Engine and make a 3D Platformer Game. Forming MP Games, TRAPP3D development went underway. The game is now in a demo stage for testing. 

TRAPP3D is a 3D Platformer with exploration, skill, puzzles and vibrant worlds. Fight Bosses with spells, find collectables and secret rooms, and climb your way through the world of TRAPP3D. It wont be easy, but Mr. Mousey will help guide you along the way.

The first 3 levels are fully playable and have been tested in house to be sure they can be completed.
We welcome any feedback and are always looking to improve on what we have created!
Please report any bugs using the template found in our discord at: https://discord.gg/Ac7DjXZ6RK

https://manyproblems.dev/
